verbs.description: [V: slain] [ARG1: saudi journalist] jamal khashoggi sons issue emotional appeal for return of their father body the sons of murdered journalist jamal khashoggi issued an emotional appeal for the return of their father body in their first interview since he was killed in the saudi consulate in istanbul a month ago jamal khashoggi
